text_name_Desc: Prayer has been unlocked. Pray to the stars of this world to get different characters and weapons
Liyue is preparing for a grand festival. Amidst the jubilation and celebration, it is also full of new opportunities. Please take part in it
Deep into the dangerous deep spiral, challenge your limits, and win the hidden treasures
Accept the challenge of the Holy Realm and win holy relics with powerful attributes and unique effects
Accept the challenge of the gold hidden realm and win the considerable wealth in it
Accept the challenge of mastering the secret realm and win valuable materials that can improve the character's talent level
Accept the challenge of revealing the secret realm and win props that can greatly improve the character's experience
Accept the challenge of the secret realm of martial arts and get rare props that can bring breakthroughs to weapons
The passage between the worlds has been opened. Join other people's worlds, or welcome travelers from other worlds, let's take an adventure together
